Title: Always Bet Black
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Joe Fazzio, Erika Harrison (executive story editor), Fernanda Coppel (story editor), Morenike Balogun (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Alfred Enoch, Jack Falahee
Plot: Annalise presents her class with a high-profile murder case that pushes even the Keating 5's morals, while Laurel makes a shocking discovery through an unlikely source.
